In England, in the seven days to 29 July, there were 164,567 new confirmed cases (292.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 July, there were 252,441 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 35% (87,874 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 August is 5,173,082 (9,190.6 cases per 100,000 population).
